ValidationRule.description: if opportunity is closed lost and reason for lost is populated, add additional context in additional comments section
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile",
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC ),
NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Reason_for_Lost__c ))), ISBLANK(Additional_Comments__c)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: please add additional context in the addtional comments section for closed lost opportunity
